Works and tested with UPDATE3

Dedicated server Test (Passed)
Client Test (Passed)

Both working and Displaying on LAN and INTERNET. in Freeplay server browser..
Just RUN update.3.exe, update, and thats it.
If you cant get it to work with Greenluma, try smartsteam.

Had to make an account to comment that it actually worked haha. All you gotta do is follow the instructions step by step, and if you have a current installation of Brink then you're really gonna have to uninstall then reinstall it to make it work.

i not sure about this.

it seem after update 2 for a while, some servers are locked or not let me join like it used to be.

and this happen on both smart steam or green luma.
You mean locked/private servers, thats a game feature, they just set the game to private so no one can join but them or friends if the game has password.
is there any chance to get me VAC Banned for this?
Okay.  So I followed the instructions step-by-step, but when I try to join any server over internet, I get "Cannot authenticate user".  I am using greenluma.

Fixed it.
-Updated to update 3
-Installed Tunngle
-Switched to smartsteam

Game is pretty good, too bad it's dead as hell.
IF U HAVING CRASHES TO DESKTOP JUST RENAME THE INTRO MOVIES IN BASE/ASSETS AND THATS IT

yeah works fine, thx guys ;)
but the gameplay of this game is soooo bad, it's horrible to play it.. i think i'm gonna go back to modern warfare 2 for the multiplayer :D
thx anyway guys

@teenmeany1st - The same thing is happening to me, except the Brink process isn't even showing up. When I first installed it last night (following all the instructions listed here exactly), I could play and played for about two hours. But now today when I try to play, I get the splash for a couple of seconds, then nothing. Anyone have any ideas?

Now this is funny.

I installed the game yesterday, applied Update 4 & played it for some time and I noticed that the exclusive content like the Doom & Fallout packs (with weapons and clothes) were there.

However, I reinstalled the game today & added the MP patch, and things are well. (I even played a match online) but the exclusive content is missing.

Is it something to do with the MP crack guys?
